roleset.name: re-insert a stent to prevent closure
roleset.note: RESTENTING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to stent.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from restenting.01-n)

roles.note: This frame differs from stent.01 in that it has an arguement for the stent itself. (from restenting.01-n)

example.name: Args 1 and 2
example.text: Re-stenting of the left anterior descending artery with 2.5 x 15 and 2.5 x 32 mm Endeavor drug - eluting stents
example.arg: of the left anterior descending artery
with 2.5 x 15 and 2.5 x 32 mm Endeavor drug - eluting stents
